Record.Synonym: Anti Neutrophil Cytoplasmic Antibody Associated Vasculitis
Record.Description: Group of systemic vasculitis with a strong association with ANCA. The disorders are characterized by necrotizing inflammation of small and medium size vessels, with little or no immune-complex deposits in vessel walls.
